About.paragraph: Pinwear grew out of my experiences as kid growing up in Jamaica. The safety pins I used there to repair clothes has now become the symbol of my fashion enterprise.  Our running man logo represents where we've started and our enthusiasm to keep moving forward with our innovative athletic apparel.
About.paragraph2: Now based in NYC, we have designed a product line that exemplifies the highest quality in men's and women's activewear. All items are made from 100% organic cotton and pre-shrunk. With fabric that breathes and stays dry, you'll have nothing holding you back at the gym, basketball court, or track. Our line of men's and women's tshirts feature graphics that will make you stand out. Men's shorts and women's shorts and leggings are light and comfortable, great for any kind of workout.
About.paragraph3: Besides making high quality apparell, Pinwear is building partnerships to promote local talent, both in sports and entertainment. Follow us on social media to hear about our next exciting event!

Talent.paragraph: Pinwear's Discovery Talent Movement is an initiave focused on helping musicians, artists, and entertainers reach their full potential.
Talent.paragraph2: Starting in April, we will be holding bi-monthly talent showcases featuring up and coming talent.
Talent.paragraph3: We also have opportunties for talented individuals to work with us in building brand awareness.

Services.name: Store
Services.text: Step into style with our online store, where fashion meets convenience! Discover curated collections featuring the latest trends and timeless classics, all delivered straight to your doorstep for the ultimate shopping experience.

Services.name: YouTube
Services.text: Featured spotlights on emerging NYC artists, tips on how to stay fit, and fashion shows unveiling our latest designs

Services.name: Instagram
Services.text: Follow us for daily fashion inspiration and exclusive offers that will elevate your wardrobe to new heights!

Services.name: Events
Services.text: Pinwear sponsored music, fashion, and fitness events are now being scheduled

Features.title: Education
Features.text: Bringing the most essential information about mental health conditions to those who need it most

Features.title: Support
Features.text: Fostering acceptance and encouragement among those impacted by mental health challenges

Features.title: Outreach
Features.text: Working with community institutions and leaders to spread awareness, reduce stigma, and find creative solutions

Features.title: Wellness
Features.text: Promoting mental health as a part of overall mind/body wellness

Features.title: Fashion
Features.text: Designs that fuse Jamaican culture and American streetwear

Features.text: Durable and light to maximize performance

Features.title: Music
